title: Virtualenv project resource
description: Install and manage local packages for a project with virtualenv

dest.description: The directory to create virtualenv at

python.description: A path to the python interpreter to use to create the virtualenv. This defaults to the global python3 version.

noVcsIgnore.description: Don't create VCS ignore directive in the destination directory (default: False)

systemSitePackages.description: Give the virtual environment access to the system site-packages dir (default: False)

symlinks.description: Try to use symlinks rather than copies (default: True)

cwd.description: The cwd to create virtualenv from. This allows a relative path to be used for dest.

automaticallyInstallRequirementsTxt.description: If an requirements.txt is available in the cwd, automatically install it when a virtual env is first created.
